title: Training Fanseg - Some Clarity will be much appreciated  (^_^)
body:
Downloaded the folder Fanseg 08.31.2019 from google drive. 
(https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1eLmnIdfvdUPcKfBkuGp9t_GOw-zDnh5n)

On extraction, found it's got multiple folders, e.g. - glasses, fingers, helmet etc... in data_src folder
and also, for data_dst folder like glasses, Holi, other. 

My Setup for Training Fanseg 
----------------------------------

**for data_src -**
 
Combined all pictures from various folders in data_src 
to \workspace\data_src\aligned 
(again; e.g. - folders like glasses, fingers, helmet etc... to data_dst aligned folder)

**for data_dst -**

Added manually edited masks at my end - plus pre-existing folders - glasses, holi, other  
to \workspace\data_dst\aligned  
(combined all of them )

set the batch size as 24 (as per the instructions in the readme.txt file)
and face: full 
running the .bat file with --model DEV_FANSEG.

**Questions - 0_o**
 
1 - is the setup correct? 
2 - if yes; how many epochs to run? or till what loss values? 
3 - would the batch size 32 produce more accurate results?
4 - lastly, I read 
"Result model\FANSeg_256_full_face.h5 should be placed to DeepFacelab\facelib\ folder"; 
is that correct? 
(because i checked that location in DFL latest build and didn't see any existing FANSeg_256_full_face.h5 file in that location) 

_Any help much much; appreciated :)_
